```
     when green flag clicked
      repeat (10)
      change size by (10)
      wait (0.2) seconds
      end
      hide
      play sound (Pop v) until done 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      show
      set size to (100) %
      repeat (10)
      change size by (10)
      wait (0.2) seconds
      end
      hide
      play sound (Pop v) until done 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      show
      set size to (100) %
      repeat until <(size) = (200)>
      change size by (10)
      wait (0.2) seconds
      end
      hide
      play sound (Pop v) until done 
    ```
